title: Hour 2: East Mode
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, and Marcus Spears debate if the Cowboys can still win the NFC East with Dak on IR for at least 4 games. Plus, what is Mad Dog mad about?? He hashes out all his grudges in a fired up new segment with Stephen A. Broncos coach Nathaniel Hackett admits he was wrong to go for the field goal in the Broncos crushing Week 1 loss to the Seahawks, but is he the only one at fault or is there plenty of blame to go around? Mad Dog gives us his top 5 underdogs to watch in NFL Week 2. The Las Vegas Aces took a 2-0 lead over the Connecticut Sun in the WNBA Finals and are one win away from their first franchise win. But does Stephen A. think they can make it a clean sweep?
